steps.name: Given I have created a ProvidedCapability
And there is no background process that updates the Phase on its Status
When I create the capability and wait for its completion phase with a timeout of one second

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a support developer, I would like perform common operations on the ProvidedCapability resources through a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
